author: Associated Press
title: Judge Releases Michael Avenatti From Jail Due to Coronavirus Threat
description: A judge has allowed Michael Avenatti to be temporarily freed from federal jail in NYC and to ride out the coronavirus scare in Los Angeles.
content:
(LOS ANGELES) — A judge has allowed Michael Avenatti to be temporarily freed from a federal jail in New York City and to ride out the coronavirus scare at a friend’s house in Los Angeles.
The attorney, who rose to fame representing porn star Stormy Daniels i… [+1043 chars]
